titles.title: To amend the Act of August 9, 1955, to authorize the Confederated Tribes of the Siletz Indians of Oregon to obtain 99-year lease authority for trust land.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 11/3/2009--Introduced. Authorizes the Confederated Tribes of the Siletz Indians of Oregon to obtain 99-year lease authority for trust land.
